name: Abhinav Singhal
intro_line: I'm a Software Engineer working full-time as a Backend Developer at Deeptek, focusing on scalable and secure backend solutions.
about: Backend Engineer at Deeptek Medical Imaging, experienced in designing scalable RESTful APIs, optimizing database performance, and enhancing backend architecture for healthcare solutions.

responsibilities: Revamped backend architecture, scaling platform across India.
Implemented Celery for task scheduling, improving efficiency by 40%.
Designed RESTful APIs ensuring real-time health data insights.
Led architectural redesign of a Medical Imaging solution, isolating the DICOM inferencing module.
Implemented encryption for sensitive medical records.
Established an API testing framework using Apidog, reducing post-deployment bugs by 25%.
Automated deployment processes, reducing manual effort by 30%.
Ensured scaling of critical services for Amazon's Just Walk Out stores.
Debugged and patched software glitches for smooth operations.

activities.name: Enigma Programming Club
activities.description: Organized bootcamps for freshers to introduce multiple coding languages and platforms. Developed test problems for club recruitment.

activities.name: HUHC (Help Us to Help the Child)
activities.description: Volunteered at an NGO, providing education to underprivileged children in Ghaziabad.
